item.title: Breaking: Hotbit Allegedly Goes on Selling Rampage, Rugpull Attempt?
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
There are suspicions that cryptocurrency trading platform Hotbit may have initiated a rugpull attempt on its customers. Decentralized Finance (DeFi) project RichQuack announced on Twitter that it had experienced a rugpull orchestrated by Hotbit. Based on the tweet, the crypto trading platform allegedly sold 256 Trillion QUACK tokens which belong to $QUACK holders on the

item.title: Just In: Most US Fed Officials Expect More Rate Hikes Until 2023 End

item.description:

item.description:
Amid the recent recovery in the crypto market, the Ethereum price gave a strong breakout from the monthly resistance of $1922. item.title: Massive 5292 Bitcoin (BTC) Linked To Terra Founder Do Kwon And LFG On The Move
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Terraform Labs (TFL) and co-founder Do Kwon have moved Bitcoin and other crypto assets worth millions in the last few months. The remaining 5,292 Bitcoins linked to the Luna Foundation Guard (LFG) and Do Kwon also moved to another crypto wallet earlier this week, reported South Korean news media on July 5. item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Financial authorities in South Korea prepares for the second phase of virtual asset legislation this month to regulate the remaining aspects of the crypto market. The move comes as South Korea’s National Assembly passed the “Virtual Asset User Protection Act” last week that defines digital assets, penalties for unfair transactions, and gives oversight power to

item.title: Vietnam Launches Recent Investigation Into Pi Cryptocurrency
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Regulatory authorities in Vietnam have started investigating the Pi cryptocurrency, announced the Department of Cybersecurity and High-Tech Crime Prevention. Speaking at a meeting in Hanoi last week, department head Le Xuan Minh said: “The operations of cryptocurrency models like Pi have been exceedingly complex and unmanaged recently. There is no other business activity that can

The post Vietnam Launches Recent Investigation Into Pi Cryptocurrency appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Regulators in Australia Search Binance Offices As Part of Derivatives Probe
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Financial regulators in Australia have recently searched the offices of crypto exchange Binance during its ongoing probe of the crypto exchange. This comes as part of the derivatives probe, a business that Binance discontinued in Australia earlier this year. As per the Bloomberg report, the Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) conducted searches at Binance

The post Regulators in Australia Search Binance Offices As Part of Derivatives Probe appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Litecoin Price Surges 20% In A Week – Can LTC Bulls Keep Up The Pace Ahead Of Halving?
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Litecoin price is faring well ahead of the much-awaited halving event on August 20. In just a week, LTC’s market value has increased by 20.5% to $105, allowing investors to recoup the losses incurred during the rout in June. In contrast to the general trend among digital assets, including Bitcoin, Litecoin has experienced a consistent
